column2: You spy a sapphire glimmer in the nearby waters.
column3: The sapphire glimmer flickers and fades...
column4: You catch another glimpse of the sapphire glimmer!

column2: You sense the movements of an unexpected predator!
column3: The predator seems to have moved on...

column2: A scarlet streak rises from the depths!
column3: The scarlet streak seems to dissipate...
column4: The scarlet streak rises once more!
